mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User ( hmm_id, name, department, password ) VALUES ( #{hmmId}, #{name}, #{department}, #{password} )
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET name = #{name}, hmm_id = #{hmmId}, department = #{department}, password = #{password} WHERE idx = #{idx}

SELECT asset_model_name, COUNT(*) as countUsage
FROM asset_info
LEFT JOIN hmm_member ON asset_info.status_member_id=hmm_member.member_id
LEFT JOIN hmm_department ON hmm_member.member_department=hmm_department.department_name
LEFT JOIN asset_model ON asset_info.asset_model_name=asset_model.model_name
WHERE department_region = '여의도' AND model_type = #{search} AND (status_asset_usage = '재고' and asset_info.status_asset_status ='양호')
WHERE department_region = '부산' AND department_floor NOT LIKE CONCAT('%' '중앙동' '%') AND status_asset_usage = '재고'
WHERE department_floor = '중앙동' AND status_asset_usage = '재고'
GROUP BY asset_model_name
ORDER BY asset_model.model_type, asset_model.model_name
